mapper.insert: insert into with_studygroup_msg (group_no, member_no, recv_id, content) values ( #{groupNo}, #{memberNo}, #{recvId}, #{content} )
mapper.select: select group_no, msg_no, recv_id, member_no, content, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d')as reg_date from with_studygroup_msg where recv_id = #{recvId} and msg_check = 0
